text: Artan Vila (born 4 May 1970) is a retired Albanian football defender. ==Club career== Vila played the majority of his career for hometown club Teuta Durrës, with whom he won the 1994 league title.Krejt papritmas Kampionati u zbukurua paksa… - Panorama ==International career== He made his debut for Albania in a November 1996 FIFA World Cup qualification match against Armenia in Tirana and earned a total of 2 caps, scoring no goals. His other international game was a June 1997 World Cup qualification match against Portugal. ==Honours== *Albanian Superliga: 1 :: 1994 Albania - Championship Winning Teams - RSSSF ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Durrës Category:Association football defenders Category:Albanian footballers Category:Albania international footballers Category:KF Teuta Durrës players Category:Besa Kavajë players Category:Albanian Superliga players
title: Artan Vila
